attributes.action: Terminate the £20 fee for the mandatory renewal of driving licence photos
attributes.additional_details: Since it is an imposition that has been forced upon us by the DVLA and since it is mandatory then there should be no requirement for a £20 fee when being forced to renew your driving licence photo every 10 years.  Not only is £20 entirely out of touch and not representative of value for money, but this is not a valid expense and should therefore be removed.
